name: Grim Touch
description:
STORY

The grim reaper decided to overthrow Heaven and Hell. Hell is already gone. You are the angel that guards the gates of Heaven. Defeat the angel of death before it is too late. But beware, it bears the Grim Touch, a deathly scythe that can destroy EVERYTHING it touches!

A top-down action game made for Mini Jam 119.

Known glitches:

  • Unfortunately the character can't move downwards due to the collider of the Dialogue box (forgot to set it as a trigger at the final rush for submitting)
CONTROLS
  • WASD/Arrows - Move
  • Left click/Space- Ranged attack
  • Right click/Ctrl - Dash
